Jubilate: O be joyful in the Lord, all you lands; *
heading: "congregation"

Jubilate: and come before his presence with a song.
heading: "congregation"

Jubilate: Be assured that the Lord, he is God; *
heading: "congregation"

Jubilate: it is he that has made us, and not we ourselves;
heading: "congregation"

Jubilate: we are his people, and the sheep of his pasture.
heading: "congregation"

Jubilate: O go your way into his gates with thanksgiving,
heading: "congregation"

Jubilate: and into his courts with praise; *
heading: "congregation"

Jubilate: be thankful unto him, and speak good of his Name.
heading: "congregation"

Jubilate: For the Lord is gracious, his mercy is everlasting, *
heading: "congregation"

Jubilate: and his truth endures from generation to generation.
heading: "congregation"
